• about me

    Hi! My name is Daniel Ormisher. I am a web developer, and this is my site. On here you can find information about me and what I'm interested in, see examples of my work, and (if you go to my blog) see what wondrous thoughts are emanating from my brain. If you wish to speak to me for any reason please don't hesitate to contact me.

    Currently working with...

    • ASP.NET MVC 3
    • Spark view engine
    • Javascript / jQuery
    • Entity Framework 4.1 (code first)
    • nUnit
    • Team City
    • Migrator dot net

  • work

    For my day job, I work as an enterprise level web developer / software developer at ekmSystems, the UK's leading provider of hosted ecommerce software solutions. A great place to work where developers skills are highly valued. I primarily work on creating standlone, international products, whose primary purpose is to improve the experience for the core customer group who use ekmPowershop, the company's flagship product.
